comment: nonsense! Israel is the only democracy in the middle east - the size of a matchbox surrounded by a football field of islamic theocracies hell bent on the destruction of israel and the usa.
amr:
# ::snt nonsense! Israel is the only democracy in the middle east - the size of a matchbox surrounded by a football field of islamic theocracies hell bent on the destruction of israel and the usa.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / sense-02
            :polarity -
            :mode expressive)
      :snt2 (d / democracy
            :domain (c / country
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Israel"))
            :mod (o / only)
            :location (w / world-region
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Middle"
                        :op2 "East"))
            :ARG1-of (s2 / size-01
                  :ARG2 (m2 / matchbox
                        :ARG1-of (s3 / surround-01
                              :ARG2 (f / field
                                    :mod (f2 / football)
                                    :consist-of (t / theocracy
                                          :mod (r / religious-group
                                                :name (n3 / name
                                                      :op1 "Islam"))
                                          :ARG0-of (b / bent-06
                                                :ARG1 (d2 / destroy-01
                                                      :ARG0 t
                                                      :ARG1 (a / and
                                                            :op1 (c2 / country
                                                                  :name (n4 / name
                                                                        :op1 "Israel"))
                                                            :op2 (c3 / country
                                                                  :name (n5 / name
                                                                        :op1 "US"))))
                                                :mod (h / hell)))))))))

comment: Please eliminate the snarky remarks from your text.
amr:
# ::snt Please eliminate the snarky remarks from your text.
(e / eliminate-01
      :mode imperative
      :polite +
      :ARG0 (y / you)
      :ARG1 (r / remark-01
            :mod (s / snarky)
            :source (t / text
                  :poss y)))

comment: This language is racist, sexist, anti-semitic, and homophobic. It's unacceptable hate speech, these comments are derogatory and wrong.
amr:
# ::snt This language is racist, sexist, anti-semitic, and homophobic. It's unacceptable hate speech, these comments are derogatory and wrong.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (r / racist
                  :domain (l / language
                        :mod (t / this)))
            :op2 (s / sexist
                  :domain l)
            :op3 (o / oppose-01
                  :ARG0 l
                  :ARG1 (r2 / religious-group
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Jew")))
            :op4 (h / homophobia
                  :domain l))
      :snt2 (a2 / and
            :op1 (s2 / speak-01
                  :mod (h2 / hate-01)
                  :ARG1-of (a3 / accept-01
                        :ARG1-of (p / possible-01
                              :polarity -)))
            :op2 (a4 / and
                  :op1 (d / derogatory
                        :domain (t2 / thing
                              :ARG1-of (c / comment-01)
                              :mod (t3 / this)))
                  :op2 (w / wrong-02
                        :ARG1 t2))))

comment: Please refrain from using derogatory terms for homosexuals .
amr:
# ::snt Please refrain from using derogatory terms for homosexuals .
(r / refrain-01
      :mode imperative
      :polite +
      :ARG0 (y / you)
      :ARG1 (u / use-01
            :ARG0 y
            :ARG1 (t / term
                  :mod (d / derogatory))
            :ARG2 (h / homosexual)))
